name: tee
content:
tee noun [C]
(IN GOLF)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short plastic stick with a cup-shaped top on which a golf ball is put to be hit, or the area where this is used to start the play for each hole
bugphai/iStock/Getty Image Plus/GettyImages

tee noun [C]
(IN AMERICAN FOOTBALL)
in rugby and American football, a device that holds the ball in place before it is kicked : They set up a tee and began kicking balls. Spotting a rugby ball on a tee, he gave it a good boot for 15 yards.

tee noun [C]
(CLOTHING)
a T-shirt: Our essential short-sleeved tee is £10. The short skirt looks perfect worn with a loose white tee.
studiocasper/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

Idiom
to a tee
Add to word list
Add to word list
in golf, the place where you begin to hit the ball at each hole (= area of play), or the small stick that holds the ball up so that you can hit it easily
